name: Fireflies (itch) (Tyrannas, schadocalex, KerDelos)
description:
Description

You are a team of fireflies trying to find the exit of a dark forest. To escape, you can convert your life (represented by the number of fireflies) into light.

  • Glow is used to fill the crystals needed to open doors
  • Glow is crucial to go through bats. If your glow is lower than the number of bats, you lose life
  • If you have too much glow though, flowers can grow-up and block your way

Have a good game !

Controls
  • Arrows to move through the map
  • Space to swap life and glow
  • R to restart
